thread.section_title: HiFX New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX New Zealand | www.hifx.co.nz
thread.title: Jillian
thread.title_full: HiFX New Zealand reviewed by Jillian

author: Jillian
title: Jillian
text: HiFX were totally professional and extremely helpful. They go with you each step of the way which was a blessing in my case as I felt a little out of my depth in filling out the steps. One observation was that the process could have been a little clearer for a non financial person like myself. However, I would like to pass on my thanks to the people at HiFX, they did an amazing job.
